description: The N082 rule checks for 72 characters as the maximum summary length, however, the pep output indicates the commit summary should be less then 50 characters.  At some point, I expect someone modified the code to match the workflow via jenkins rather then the typical git mailing list approach of mailing a message to a mailing list.
